template_text: Congratulations {user_name}! Welcome to {company_name}, Your user id is : {user_id}. Visit : {website_url}. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId: {user_id}, Your OTP for two factor authentication is : {otp}. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId : {user_id}. Click on the following link to reset your password : {reset_link}. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId: {user_id}, Your OTP for mobile verification of your {company_name} account is : {otp}. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId: {user_id}, Topup successful with {package_name} for your {company_name} account. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId: {user_id}, Withdrawal of {amount} is successful for your {company_name} account. Team {company_name}.
Dear {user_name}, UserId: {user_id}, Withdrawal of {amount} is rejected for your {company_name} account. Team {company_name}.
